org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.api.engine

Class CEPEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.api.engine.CEPEngine

  • public class CEPEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The engine for processing complex events.

    The engine hosts the following components:

    • a DefaultEventModelManager, dealing with the internal representation of the (partially) matched event patterns;
    • a DefaultStreamManager, managing the streams of events;
    • an EVM ExecutionSchema, serving as the rule engine.

    An instance of the engine can be obtained either by using the default event processing context (newEngine() ), or by specifying one explicitly (newEngine(EventContext)).

    Author:
    Istvan David
